title: Is NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) Stock Worth a Buy Friday?
text:
NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) stock has gained 229.33% over the last 12 months, and the average rating from Wall Street analysts is a Strong Buy. InvestorsObserver’s proprietary ranking system, gives NVDA stock a score of  70 out of a possible 100. 





That rank is mainly influenced by a long-term technical score of 91. NVDA's rank also includes a short-term technical score of 81. 






 NVDA has an Overall Score of 70. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on NVDA!

What's Happening with NVDA Stock Today
NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) stock is lower by -0.81% while the S&P 500 is lower by -0.16% as of 10:53 AM on Friday, Jan 12. NVDA is lower by -$4.46 from the previous closing price of $548.22 on volume of 11,898,632 shares. Over the past year the S&P 500 has risen 19.82% while NVDA has gained 229.33%. NVDA earned $7.57 a per share in the over the last 12 months, giving it a price-to-earnings ratio of 71.97.
